translated: I paid homage to the fire, the moon, the sun,

analyzed: bahu vata samādānā  aḍḍham sīsassa olikhi
translated: I had many vows🔽and I pierced my head.
I made my bed on the bare ground
and I didn’t eat at night.
Seeing the body as it really is,
as were my wishes and aspirations.
I have attained peace of mind.”
